title: /ff is the Safe Word (ft Yaiamone and dean) | Rank 23 Evelynn One-Trick

embed.description: Omigosh! I was so fortunate that I was able to play a few games with Yaiamone (a streamer) and dean (Challenger 150LP). It was such a great experience :D Check out Yaiamone's stream: https://www.twitch.tv/yaiamone My stream: https://mixer.com/CynderIsAwkward Music: Titanium + Alone || Syrex

body: Last night I got to experience my first shot at high-elo gameplay thanks to Yaiamone. It was a really enjoyable experience. I even got to play with the Rank 39 Challenger, dean. So yay :D

replies.body: Gameplay was nice, couldn't watch the rest of the video due to my hate towards nightcore crap, good effort though

So... no nightcore is what you're saying? Just find some generic music?

Will do :) Thanks

1. It's just my opinion, if your viewers are weaboos that enjoy that stuff then keep it.
2. You don't have to find "generic" music, no one likes to listen to the same Warsongs that every Youtuber uses in their montage or that same popular Alan Walker song. Just find a good fresh track that you like and will go well with your gameplay. If you need ideas there is a YouTube channel I know that producers free music for everyone to use: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56Qctnsu8wAyvzf4Yx6LIw
Check them out if you need to.

> Cool, thanks :)
